message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $15,000. I believe it will bring you a lot of value.
I'm interested in the product, but $15,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Can you meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest, Bob. While I'm willing to negotiate, $10,000 is significantly below its value. How about we meet at $13,500?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. Can you see your way to meeting me there?
